title: Feb 5 order doesn't ban hijab, Karnataka govt tells HC - Deccan Herald
content: Feb 5 order doesn't ban hijab, Karnataka govt tells HC  Deccan HeraldView Full coverage on Google News
description: Amid the raging row over the hijab issue in Karnataka, the state government has told the High Court that its order dated February 5 did not ban the headscarf but only delegated the powers to decide the school uniform to the College Development Committees (CDC).
